publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1446.1 Karen Whitefield: General Education Department at Coatbridge Collegeâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-1446) in the name of Elaine Smith, insert at end "and expresses its disappointment at the recent letter by the First Minister to Elaine Smith MSP, in which he states that he finds it hard to conclude that the board is not delivering for students and that he is unable to give a commitment to intervene to prevent the closure of the General Education Department." Supported by: Elaine Smith*

S3M-1446.1 General Education Department at Coatbridge College (lodged on 14 March 2008) Mary Mulligan*, John Park*, Trish Godman*, Cathie Craigie*, Des McNulty*, Hugh Henry*, Marlyn Glen*, Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-1446.1 General Education Department at Coatbridge College (lodged on 14 March 2008) Mr Frank McAveety*, Karen Gillon*, Cathy Peattie*, Bill Butler*
S3M-1446.1 General Education Department at Coatbridge College (lodged on 14 March 2008) Elaine Murray*
